targets.rawSql:
select value 
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'f1score'
order by created_at 
desc limit 1

select value 
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'precision'
order by created_at 
desc limit 1

select value 
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'recall'
order by created_at 
desc limit 1

select value 
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'accuracy'
order by created_at 
desc limit 1

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'f1score'
order by created_at

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'precision'
order by created_at

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'recall'
order by created_at

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'accuracy'
order by created_at

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'driftedcolumnscount[count]'
order by created_at

select created_at, value
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'driftedcolumnscount[share]'
order by created_at

panels.title: Drifted Column Share of Total Columns

targets.rawSql:
select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_churn'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_age_group'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_call_failure'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_charge_amount'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_complains'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_customer_value'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_distinct_called_numbers'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_frequency_of_sms'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_frequency_of_use'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_seconds_of_use'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_status'
order by created_at

select created_at, value as "p-value"
from drift_metrics 
where metric_name = 'valuedrift_subscription_length'
order by created_at
